description:
If you want to taste the vintage of the day and only the vintage of the day, Hydroflask’s line of ceramic lined wine drinkware is for you. The gentle ceramic finish leaves flavours completely untouched and will leave you picking out notes that would make a sommelier proud… we just won’t tell them about the “Rosé all day” shirt.

  • Ceramic lining keeps flavours pure
  • TempShield™ double wall insulated technology keeps your whites cool and your reds safe from the sun, and it won’t sweat on you
  • Holds 2 standard pours so you’ve got a glass for with the meal and one for with the conversation
  • 18/8 food grade stainless steel is the benchmark steel of the high-end culinary world
  • Press-fit lid has a sliding closure for maximum slosh-resistance and has honeycomb insulation to keep things chill
  • Cap is dishwasher safe and recyclable PP#5
name: Hydro Flask Ceramic Wine Tumbler 298ml
